subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Sanya Richards and Jeremy Wariner ran the anchor legs Saturday night at the Bird’s Nest as the women’s and men’s 4x400-meter relays won gold medals.
snippet: Sanya Richards and Jeremy Wariner ran the anchor legs Saturday night at the Bird’s Nest as the women’s and men’s 4x400-meter relays won gold medals.
